channel.title: Cracked CoD?
channel.description: Does anyone have a good website for cracked call of duty games? (Example: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare) and so on, but I do specifically want the game provided in the example. I just downloaded a supposed "full version" of call of duty: modern warfare which was 2gb and it ended up being the campaign only version.

item.title: Cracked CoD?
item.dc:creator: @Kodiak Kodiak
item.description:
@Kodiak wrote:

[quote=“mr arrows95, post:12, topic:471165”]This forum disappoints me sometimes…

It’s very, very easy to pirate and play on cracked server for COD…

Here’s a small list.

http://www.epcgaming.com/v2.5/view_servers.php?game=cod4[/quote]

fuck yo list

Read full topic

item.title: Cracked CoD?
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

[quote=“Niall, post:9, topic:471165”][quote author=-Nothing link=topic=588703.msg4174553#msg4174553 date=1354829463]
There was alterIWnet for black ops and MW2 but I just checked it out and it’s been shutdown.
[/quote]

when I played there was a grand total of (5) people on MW2 and two of them had aimbots[/quote]
When I played there wasn’t any hackers really and you could easily find full lobbies, I remember seeing about 2000+ online by the time.

Read full topic

item.title: Cracked CoD?
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

[quote=“Rodgerwilco, post:5, topic:471165”][quote author=SilentCJ link=topic=588703.msg4173759#msg4173759 date=1354714173]
Almost no recent games will have the ‘full version’ with online if it’s cracked, and even the ones that do will run on private servers and such…

Anyway, why not just buy that game? What is it, like a fiver?
[/quote]

who would buy 20 cod versions…[/quote]…
What the fuck?
He didn’t even mention that. Go home roger, you’re drunk.

Read full topic

item.title: Cracked CoD?
item.dc:creator: @Kodiak Kodiak
item.description:
@Kodiak wrote:

thanks for the replies, but shortly after posting this i realized pc cod games were pretty stupid. and from what i hear alot of the pc MP servers are shutting down for the older cods. anyways i play ps3 i just wanted to play some oldschool pc pm me for my PSN

Read full topic

item.title: Cracked CoD?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

cracked versions of call of duty don’t have multiplayer because they run through their own multiplayer service, there are tools for a cracked multiplayer but seeing as pc has less cod players anyway and even less cracked players, don’t expect to find a full lobby

Read full topic
